page.title: 03OUR VISIT TO SINFIN LIBRARY
page.content: Sinfin library was opened on January 17th 1983.They have a classroom where they have meetings and where schools work.To join the library you have to give your name and address which is put into the computer.You don't have to pay anything.The computer holds this information,Names and addresses of everyone who's joined the library, number of books, The name of every book and which library each book is at. If books are over due the children have to pay 1p daily,adults pay 2p. They have 100 reference books, 19701 reading books and 4374 junior fiction books.They are open every day apart from Sunday. They found out that young people use the library more than the old.You need a degree to be a librarian and two'O'levels to be a librarian's assistant.The most popular type of book is romance.
